description:
A strong boy goes on a journey. The man with the most filial piety in the village is found.  Sharks bang against bells.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikaratarou / Mura Ichiban no Koukou Musuko / Bonbon Same
Chikaratarou / The Son with the Most Filial Piety in the Village / The Bong-Bong Sharks
力太郎 / 村いちばんの孝行息子 / ぼんぼんザメ
